description.originalText:
Monae worked for my family from January 2020 through June 2020. She was hired as a part-time babysitter. Her responsibilities included picking up my 4 year old from school, bringing him to his various activities, preparing dinner for him, and getting him ready for bed. Around March 2020, after the COVID-19 outbreak, she began working full time hours. In this capacity, she was watching my son, helping him with his remote learning, providing supplemental tutoring, preparing his meals, and getting him ready for bed in the evenings.
Throughout her time with us, she was always prompt and attentive to the needs of my son. She enforced the rules I had, and was very proactive in finding different educational activities for him to do. She was flexible when I needed her to work extra hours and made sure to clean up after my son. Monae is very experienced with children and excels at tutoring - she was able to keep my son on task and was very diligent and organized about planning lessons for him when school was no longer in session. We parted ways at the end of June when my son started attending camp full time and we no longer needed a babysitter.
Monae is a very hard-working, organized, and capable individual who is serious about her work and is diligent and focused on whatever she is working on.

description.displayText:
Monae O. was the nanny for our 5-year-old daughter, E, for 24 months, beginning in August 2020. With all the craziness of COVID and DOE school closures/remote learning, Monae watched E 20+ hours a week to keep her on track and up to speed with her schoolwork, which was sorely needed.  
Monae takes academics seriously and recommends specific curricula and workbooks for E to keep her up with reading and writing. In addition, Monae provided a structure for E that taught her to follow directions, learn manners, and earn rewards when she worked hard. 
Monae also assisted with everyday items such as bathing, meal prep, and play dates. She is responsive and flexible to changing schedule needs and takes her role as a caregiver very seriously.
description.originalText:
Monae O. was the nanny for our 5-year-old daughter, E, for 24 months, beginning in August 2020. With all the craziness of COVID and DOE school closures/remote learning, Monae watched E 20+ hours a week to keep her on track and up to speed with her schoolwork, which was sorely needed.  
Monae takes academics seriously and recommends specific curricula and workbooks for E to keep her up with reading and writing. In addition, Monae provided a structure for E that taught her to follow directions, learn manners, and earn rewards when she worked hard. 
Monae also assisted with everyday items such as bathing, meal prep, and play dates. She is responsive and flexible to changing schedule needs and takes her role as a caregiver very seriously.

Monae has been working with my family off and on since mid-February 2019 and has proven herself to be thoughtful, 
a reliable and responsible caregiver who values and demonstrates grit, personal integrity, and determination. 
I have three children who all struggle with significant disabilities in various areas of learning, processing, and regulating their emotions and behaviors. Their conditions cause them to be, at times, irrational, defiant, explosive, inflexible, unfocused, and impulsive. Managing and supporting them in daily tasks and activities requires the right attitude and a strong desire to understand what factors drive their maladaptive behaviors. It is an extraordinarily demanding position, both physically and 
mentally. 
Monae has shown integrity and determination by committing to work with us long-term. She took courses on understanding the psychological roots of my children's difficulties and independently researched related topics. She arrives on time or early and reliably follows through on her scheduling commitments to us, always mindfully planning. She is organized and takes detailed notes on my instructions, which is particularly important to me regarding the administration of medications. She also spends personal time looking for programs and therapeutic activities to help my children. 

We are sad to lose her due to an international move!

If anyone is looking for a truly exceptional nanny/babysitter, I'd happily recommend Monae to you! Monae is an experienced childcare provider who ensures your child is safe, nurtured, and engaged! She is competent, patient, trustworthy, has a calm demeanor and positive attitude, and is an excellent role model. I am confident that Monae will bring the same level of care, expertise, and dedication to your children as she did to ours.
